title: ariyAdAr vambinai
sahitya:
ariyAdAr vambinaip-peridAga eNNiyE allarp-paDAdE manamE


anupallavi

  pori pulan kaNDadE poruLenak-kaNDapEr aruL uNarvillAdAr anbinai uNarAdAr


caraNam    kanaka yAzhisai oli kazhudaikku puriyumO kadiriDum azhaginbam kapOdikkut-teriyumO
vana malar mAlaiyai markkaDam pugazhumO varakavi uNarAda varaTTu matiyinAl
